summary: This document is a summary of account balances for the Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust at Deutsche Bank for the month of September 2014. It details the account balance, transactions, service charges, and provides contact information for inquiries regarding the account.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact person for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the beneficiary of the insurance trust referenced in the document.

keyFacts: The document summarizes account balances for the Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust.
The account had a balance of $206.25 as of September 30, 2014.
There were service charges and fees totaling $50.00 during the statement period.
Amanda Kirby is the contact person for inquiries related to the account.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors in account statements.
